nodes.text: Danel was a male individual who was a member of the Crystal Wasters, a group of surfers that were based on the moon Dorumaa during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Circa 20 BBY, Danel began working for the organization of the crime lord Rufus Trammel.

Danel was created by Rob Edwards and was mentioned in the 2003 role-playing adventure Dorumaa's Children. In the adventure, the character's name is spelt as both "Danel" and "Denal." This article spells his name as "Danel," because that is the spelling that is used most frequently in the scenario.
